p: Two series of compounds exhibiting aminophenylbenzimidazole and benzimidazole like entities are patented by ViroPharma Inc. as HCV helicase inhibitors [ 62]. Vertex Pharmaceuticals Inc. accounted various aminothiadiazoliums which also exhibit anti-helicase activity but with lower efficacy [ 63]. Two derivatives of 2-arylbenzofuran isolated from Mori cortex radicis have shown potent inhibition against HCV NS3 helicase [ 62]. (Structures are cited in figure 3).
